events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking page hasn't updated in days.
Customer issue identified as related to delivery delay due to late shipping and tracking concerns.
Customer assigned to delivery support agent for further assistance with delayed shipment.
Hello! I'm here to help with your delayed order. Can you please provide the order number so I can check the status for you?
Could you confirm whether you have checked the tracking details lately and if you received any notifications about your shipping?
Yes, I checked the tracking info yesterday, but it hasn't been updated for over a week. I haven't received any notifications either.
I have contacted the carrier and requested an urgent update on your package location. We will expedite shipping if the package is lost or significantly delayed.
Thank you, I appreciate your quick response and willingness to resolve the issue promptly.
Your package has been located and dispatched with expedited shipping. It should arrive within two days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
We are checking in to ensure your package arrived safely and you are satisfied with the solution provided.
Since you have confirmed receipt and satisfaction, this case is now closed. Thank you for your patience.
